name: Knowledge Horizon
description: Knowledge Horizon is an international knowledge transfer organisation that promotes excellence in all aspects related to the acquisition of knowledge and skills. We, at Knowledge Horizon, understand the need for continuous improvement that is based on learning and the adoption of innovative solutions to various business situations. We work very closely with a number of top international and Arab expert centres to offer services that are specialised, customer-focused, skills-based and up-to-date. We believe that learning is a life-long pursuit for organisations wishing to be at the forefront of business success, customer satisfaction and orientation.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: To lead global innovation in making learning simple, easily accessible and enjoyable
ShortDescription: Knowledge Horizon is a pioneering figure in innovating e-learning-driven solutions that promote excellence in all aspects related to the acquisition of modern knowledge and relevant skills.

Highlights.name: Pioneering e-Learning Solutions
Highlights.description: Knowledge Horizon is a prominent figure in innovation when it comes to e-learning solutions. This suggests they are at the forefront of developing new and effective ways to learn online.

Highlights.name: International Knowledge Organization
Highlights.description: The website highlights Knowledge Horizon's international presence with branches in several countries. This indicates a global reach and the ability to cater to a diverse audience.

Highlights.name: Variety of Educational Services
Highlights.description: Knowledge Horizon offers a variety of services including e-learning, video learning, consultancy, and study in UK programs. This comprehensive approach allows them to provide a well-rounded educational experience for learners.

enhanced_description: Knowledge Horizon, established in 1998 and headquartered in Dubai, is an international knowledge transfer organization specializing in e-learning-driven solutions. They aim to promote excellence in the acquisition of modern knowledge and relevant skills, emphasizing continuous improvement, learning efficiency, and the adoption of innovative solutions for business success. As a pioneering figure in e-learning, Knowledge Horizon offers a variety of educational services including e-learning, video learning, and consultancy, working closely with top international and Arab expert centers. Their global presence allows them to cater to a diverse audience, with a mission to make learning simple, easily accessible, and enjoyable for organizations seeking to lead in business success and customer satisfaction.
